author: Sarah Jones
title: ‘I Feel Like the Safeguards Have Failed’: A Q&A With a Nurse on the Front Lines
description: A nurse tells us that when she tried to quarantine herself, her bosses told her to come to work anyway.
content: Health workers are on the front lines of the novel coronavirus pandemic, and that doesnt just mean theyre already at high risk for contracting the illness. Theyre also at the mercy of their employers, whose cost-cutting measures could harm staff and patients … [+6253 chars]
